title: 'Just Married' Raymundo Already Getting Hit On + Bobby’s ‘Bad Luck’ Business Proposal + Our Favorite Country Music Videos
itunes:title: 'Just Married' Raymundo Already Getting Hit On + Bobby’s ‘Bad Luck’ Business Proposal + Our Favorite Country Music Videos
description:
Our producer, Raymundo claims two girls just started talking to him and a friend. He said it’s because of his wedding ring. Bobby offers Lunchbox money to do things known to cause bad luck. He performs them in studio. Plus, we all share our favorite country music videos of all-time!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
